question: I have type 1 diabetes and so I did some research looking for peace of mind. All I found were horror stories about how my chances of miscarriage, stillbirth and neonatal death were increased. I just keep reading page after page of stuff that makes me want to cry and scream. I'm terrified of losing my baby. Is there anything I can do? I'm trying not to stress out but its really hard.
title: really scared
